title: Malibu Motel
description: "Money can buy happiness. Money is happiness. Money gives happiness a run for its money." Based on the incredible true story of a hapless lottery winner, Malibu Motel is a raw, timeless, and unforgettable novel that intimately showcases the extravagance of the super-rich and the fragility of a life rooted in spending. Caish Calloway is struggling to maintain a stake in the land of limitless privilege. Blinded by pride and fueled by greed, Caish is slave to the wiles of a moneyed mind, as only one who has tasted wealth's powerful fruit can be.
author: Chaunceton Bird
